reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable, cozy, and flattering, with one noting how the belt accentuates the waistline. Moreover, they appreciate its sturdy material and overall quality. However, the fit receives mixed feedback - while some find it flattering for any body type, others mention the waistline sits too high. Additionally, the material thickness and pocket design are also mixed aspects, with some praising the good thickness while others find the fabric thinner than expected, and some appreciating the discreet pockets while others consider them excessive. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A wonderful dress.
items.body: Amazing dress. I bought a Large and it was sage green. I’m 5’4 185 pounds. True to size. Classy, elegant and I love the fabric. Great all around quality. Very flattering and I got tons of compliments. Can’t wait to order more. They have a beautiful variety of colors. I love it! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classy faux wrap dress soft material worth price
items.body: This is a classy faux wrap dress made of soft material with pockets. The material has lines in it and it is not clingy or stacky like some reviews say. The pockets are also not adding pounds as others reviewed either and they are good. The belt is flattering tied in front or back. I like that it is a faux wrap dress as I don’t have to worry about it opening. The chest wrap part is fine but I might pin it as it could be more revealing if you are conscious of that which I am. It seems feminine and pretty and could be used for many occasions like a party, work, casual day out depending on accessories. I like that it is long sleeve too even for warmer months as you don’t have do a cardigan over it running into air conditioning etc. The beige and the white are not see thru on me either as others said. I got a few colors and of course the black which can be a solid go to with accessories for an event or just dinner out. Seems like a versatile dress and I would try one for sure. It also runs TTS. Would be nice for anyone really of any size as it seems well made and classic lines . Read more
items.author: Goody

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Basic but good
items.body: Overall a nice basic casual dress. I ordered the brown for fall and it’s a color I generally steer clear from having an olive skin tone. Having a red undertone rather than yellow, it was perfect! I ordered a large although I sometimes wear a medium and the fit was perfect. I recommend sizing up if you’re between sizes. Read more
items.author: Linda

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Looked Cute Online but Didn’t Work for Me
items.body: I ordered the Newshows Women’s Oversized Sweater Dress in Army Green (XL) thinking it would be the perfect cozy-yet-stylish winter outfit, but unfortunately it just didn’t work out for me. The pictures online made it look thicker and more structured than it really is. In person the fabric felt a bit flimsy and didn’t drape the way I expected. The fit was also off; it ran a little awkward through the shoulders and sleeves, and the overall silhouette wasn’t as flattering as I’d hoped. While I liked the idea of the pockets and the casual ribbed knit, the execution didn’t live up to my expectations. In the end I had to return it. It might work better for someone who wants a very lightweight, oversized style, but for me it just wasn’t the cozy, polished sweater dress I was looking for. Read more
items.author: Michelle Kim

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and Flattering
items.body: I purchased this wrap dress specifically for a work conference, and it was a great choice. The fit is very flattering and the fabric is incredibly comfortable, which is essential for a long day. The brown color is a nice, versatile shade for fall. The addition of pockets is a huge bonus and makes the dress even more practical. It's a fantastic option for anyone needing a polished and comfortable outfit for a business event or other special occasion. Read more
items.author: Lynn F

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering for curves
items.body: I'm 5'4 and about 235 lbs, with my thinnest part being my waist, in contrast to my abdomen which is my biggest. I have quite a pooch that sags a bit. This dress accentuates the all the good. Makes the chest and waist look great, but flares in just the right spot, so it doesn't hug any of my abdomen. It looks best if I wear a bra that gives them a little umph, but then I do have to pin it if I where to work. I bought the color that's like autumn brown and accent it with a wide brown belt of a similar shade, a gold necklace and gold bangles. I wear flat brown knee high boots with it. The outfit makes me feel great and I often get complimented. It also is comfortable, good quality and has a perfect thickness for fall or early winter. Read more
items.author: Emily

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great find
items.body: Very cute. Perfect for the wedding I’m going to. Pockets are invisible but a good size! Read more
items.author: Autumn

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars A bit big
items.body: Very comfortable and cute on my adult daughter! It was a bit big overall for a medium. She's 5'7' and about 145 lbs. Read more
items.author: Cheryl

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black-upgrade, Brown, Army Green-b, Peach, Dark Grey, Apricot, Army Green, Black, Wine Red-upgrade, Navy Blue-upgrade, Apricot-1, Royal Blue, Caramel-2, Light Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
